name: Virtual Islands
description: Enjoy a hybrid of realistic putting and arcade style mini-golf in a chill, virtual, tropical island setting!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer. Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon™ RX 480 equivalent or greater Storage: 700 MB available space
